posts.post_content:
Just purchased a tolstoi back of this same card so I'd like to sell this Piedmont back.

T206 Hughie Jennings (one hand showing).  No creases.  You'll see the staining on the upper left border.  Soft corners, etc.  I would guess a 3+ or 4 when graded?  You be the judge.

$100 shipped

Thanks for looking,

Jason
